rules.description: ALL questions must follow these 18 rules. Verify each rule before marking a task complete.
content_rules: 1. No dollar amounts (e.g., 'The fine is $150' is NOT allowed)
2. No insurance X/Y/Z format (e.g., '15/30/5 coverage' is NOT allowed)
3. No point values (e.g., 'You will receive 4 points' is NOT allowed)
4. No exact jail times (e.g., 'Up to 6 months in jail' is NOT allowed)
uniqueness_rules: 5. No two questions can be >80% similar
6. Max 3 questions per concept (e.g., max 3 about stop signs)
answer_balance_rules: 7. Correct answer must NOT be >40% longer than average of wrong answers
8. No giveaway qualifiers (don't put 'always'/'never' only in correct answer)
9. Answer distribution: 12-13 each of A, B, C, D for 50 questions (37-38 each for 150)
format_rules: 11. All fields required: question, options A-D, correctAnswer, correctIndex, explanation
12. Letter/Index must match: A=1, B=2, C=3, D=4
style_rules: 14. Don't repeat the question stem in the answers
15. All 4 answer options should be similar length
accuracy_rules: 16. No spelling errors, no grammar issues, clear wording
17. All facts verified via web search against current official sources
18. Universal questions must be true in ALL 50 states

Create 150 questions true in ALL 50 US states. Topics: traffic sign shapes/colors, lane markings, defensive driving, emergency procedures, vehicle operation, weather driving. AVOID state-variable topics (speed limits, distances, BAC numbers). Save to questions/universal-questions.json. Follow ALL 18 rules above.

tasks.task: Verify NJ questions against DMV manual
tasks.details: Web search to verify EVERY fact in nj-questions.json against current NJ Driver Manual. Fix any incorrect answers. Run through all 18 rules as final checklist.

tasks.task: Verify universal questions are truly universal
tasks.details: Check that NO universal question has an answer that varies by state. Web search questionable facts. Remove or fix any state-specific content. Run through all 18 rules as final checklist.

output_format.description: Each question in the JSON file should look like this:

example.question: What is the default speed limit in a New Jersey school zone?
example.explanation: New Jersey school zones have a default speed limit of 25 mph when children are present.
